programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.desc: For the fourth straight season, the Kings and Oilers meet in the first round in this Game 1. Defending Western Conference champion Edmonton won the previous three series. Leon Draisaitl (EDM) led the NHL with 52 goals in the regular season.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.desc: The Kings and Oilers try to follow up a thrilling start to the series in Game 2 of their Western Conference quarterfinal. Edmonton erased a 4-0 deficit in Game 1, but Phillip Danault scored with 42 seconds remaining to give Los Angeles a 6-5 victory.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Oilers try to climb back into their West first-round set with the Kings as they host Game 3. Los Angeles outscored Edmonton 12-7 to take the first two games in Hollywood. Adrian Kempe (LAK) posted two goals and four points in a 6-2 win in Game 2.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Oilers host the Kings for Game 4 of their West quarterfinal. Edmonton scored four times in the third period to pull away for a 7-4 victory, and cut Los Angeles' series lead to 2-1. Calvin Pickard earned the win after starting over Stuart Skinner.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Los Angeles Kings
programme.desc: The resurgent Oilers visit the Kings for Game 5 of their West quarterfinal. The series is tied 2-2. Evan Bouchard scored his second goal of the game with 29 seconds left in regulation before Leon Draisaitl gave the Oilers a 4-3 overtime victory.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Los Angeles Kings at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Oilers try to advance past the Kings in the first round of the postseason for a fourth straight year in Game 6. Calvin Pickard (EDM) replaced Stuart Skinner in net in Game 3, and has responded by posting a 3-0 record with a .910 save percentage.

programme.title: NHL Hockey New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.sub-title: New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes host the Devils for Game 1 of their Eastern Conference first-round playoff series. The home team won all four meetings in the regular season. Carolina needed only five games to take out New Jersey during the East semifinals in 2023.

programme.title: NHL Hockey New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.sub-title: New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to take a 2-0 lead on the Devils in Game 2 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal. Carolina outshot New Jersey 45-24 en route to a 4-1 victory in Game 1 behind forward Logan Stankoven's second two-goal playoff performance.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at New Jersey Devils
programme.sub-title: Carolina Hurricanes at New Jersey Devils
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to push the Devils to the brink in Game 3 as their Eastern Conference first-round series shifts to New Jersey. Jordan Martinook had two points, including the shorthanded winner in the second period, as Carolina took Game 2, 3-1.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at New Jersey Devils
programme.sub-title: Carolina Hurricanes at New Jersey Devils
programme.desc: The Devils try to gain momentum, now down 2-1 entering Game 4 of their first-round set with the Hurricanes. After surrendering a two-goal lead in Game 3, New Jersey got a double-overtime winner from Simon Nemec for a 3-2 victory over Carolina.

programme.title: NHL Hockey New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.sub-title: New Jersey Devils at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to send the Devils packing in Game 5 of their East quarterfinal. Andrei Svechnikov's hat trick powered Carolina to a 5-2 victory in Game 4, and a 3-1 series lead. Canes goaltender Frederik Andersen left the game with an injury.
